summary: Hoods, Masks, and Helmets are no longer visible!
descriptionHtml:
This mod will hide helmets, hoods, and masks for EVERYONE. If you want just your helmet missing, this mod is not for you. This mod is meant to allow a player to enjoy his or her facial features while still wearing armor bonuses that may include enchantments or just used in order to fill out perks, i.e. full sets of armor. 

The mod includes:
Guard Helmets
Dragon Priest Masks
Dark Brotherhood hoods (Cicero\'s Hat and Ancient Shrouded Cowl included)
Thieves Guild Hoods (Including Nightengale)
Blade\'s Helmet
Wolf Helmet
Helm of Yngol
Falmer Helmet
Forsworn Helmet
Imperial Helmet
Stormcloak Helmet
Circulets

Forge Made:
- Fur
- Leather
- Hide
- Iron
- Steel
- Dwarven
- Orcish
- Ebony
- Daedric
- Dragonbone
- Dragon Scale
- Glass
- Elven
- Ancient Nord
- Scaled

Hoods:
- Apprentice Hood
- Novice Hood
- Adept Hood
- Black Mage Hood
- Mage Hood
- Redguard Hoods

If I missed any, I would assume I just didn\'t list them. Please comment on if I missed any of the tops, or if you have any questions about this. It was crafted with the newly released Creation Kit Bethesda has released.

Installation
> Simply drag the .esp file into your data file.

Uninstall
< Delete the .esp file.

1.1 Bug Fixes
- Removed a bug that caused multiple helmets to be worn
- Removed a bug where the helmet would not give armor
- Made Cicero\'s and Jester\'s outfit set as light leather, armor rating matches that of the Nightengale set.

Enjoy!
author: Hawkueta
